ygData.msgSnippet: Malice:  I ll try to convince her it s over.  If not, we may have to act like nothing happened.  It will be an act, but she surely will understand.  Please,

Malice:  "I'll try to convince her it's over.  If not, we may have to act l=
ike nothing happened.  It will be an act, but she surely will understand.  =
Please, just do it for me?" he pleaded, knealing on his knees before her.
B=
lacknightmare: the femme hesistated, and she finally surrender and said "Do=
n't play with me... I'll do it for you, but don't betray me....I really lov=
e you"
Malice:  "I know, I'll do anything for you.  But if it comes down to=
 it..."  he hesitated, this could possibly get messy if he asked.
Blacknigh=
tmare: "What?"said the femme
Malice:  "If all else fails, uh..... would you=
 mind sharing me half the time?  I'm sure it won't come to that, but could =
you?"  He prepared himself for a blow, it was going to hurt, but it never h=
urt to have back up plans, so this could be okay, provided she didn't over =
react.
Blacknightmare: The femme slaped him again and  shout "I DON'T RISK =
MY SKIN TO SHARE YOUR LOVE FOR ANYONE ELSE!!! OR YOU LOVE ME OR YOU LEAVE M=
E!!! BUT I WON'T LIKE SHARE YOU WITH ANYONE...!!!" after that she walked an=
noyed towards the fallen ship
Malice:  He picked himself off the ground and=
 rubbed his face.  "It was worth a try, it was for the greater good.  Oh we=
ll, I just hope she can cooperate.  Wolfblade can be unrealistically pushy.=
"  He thought about catching up, but she'd probably give him an audio full =
about suggesting such a thing.  But it could work, they may resort to it if=
 Wolfblade refused to believe him.  But secretly he wished she would accept=
 it, he was in love with both of them, to end the relationship with one wou=
ld break him apart.
Blacknightmare: The femme felt destroyed, she also felt=
 betrayed and jealous. Several feeling was revoklting inside her.
Malice:  =
The male got to the ship and opened the hatch, and then looked back to Blac=
knightmare.  He could tell she was churning inside, he went over to her and=
 put his arms around her.  "I'm sorry, but the fact remains.  I love you, I=
 will do anything for you, but I love her as well.  To end it with her woul=
d destroy me, to end it with you would also destroy me.  I only want what's=
 best for everyone, please don't be mad."
Blacknightmare: The femme looked =
him and said "And knows that she's in your side, will destroy me... Jealous=
 won't let me live knowing that I have a rival..."
Malice:  "She's not a ri=
val.  She might be a little obnoxious, but she won't try to steal me away. =
 Besides, she's not a model Maximal anyway, one might mistake her for a min=
ion if you didn't know any better.  You'll be alright, I'll be alright, eve=
rything will be fine, I promise you."
 Blacknightmare: the femme still was =
annoyed and jealous.
Malice:  "I hate it when you aren't happy.  Can't you =
try to accept it.  It might be our only alternative.  I'm trying to keep us=
 together, it may be a small sacrifice, but we'll still be together."
Black=
nightmare: "Looking you together a other femme and don't know it if your he=
art would be only mine"said sadly the femme
 malice:  "I'm sory, it might n=
ot come to it, but if it does, please understand. I'll be there for you, wh=
enever you need me, i'll be there.  I don't much like it either, but we hav=
e to make it work if we need to."
Blacknightmare: "I'm still dangerous"said=
 the femme starting to cry "I still are a minon, and as minion, I feel, I c=
ould try to destroy her, or destroy you..."
Malice:  He pulled them femme c=
loser, he hated it when she cried too.  "You wouldn't.  If you could escape=
 unicron, you are strong enough to work this out.  you'll be alright, don't=
 worry about it.  It won't hurt at all, you just need to give it a try.  Bu=
t we have to try everything else first.  I would hate for either of you to =
die before me.  I'm an old bot, I don't want to out live those I love."
Bla=
cknightmare: The femme huged him and burst in tears.
